section.title: Kato tries to install patches on Windows nodes
section.p: When kato patch install is run, the installer will attempt to add patches to Windows nodes. This installation will fail with the following errors:
section.codeblock: stackato@fd-core:~$ kato patch install The authenticity of host '10.0.0.36 (10.0.0.36)' can't be established. ECDSA key fingerprint is 85:72:28:b6:4a:61:27:42:f7:0c:ab:8c:12:9a:06:ca.
